cmput301.f13t01.elasticsearch

Class StoryResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301.f13t01.elasticsearch.StoryResource

  • public class StoryResource
extends java.lang.Object
    This class keeps track of the MediaResource objects associated with a given story so that the locations of Media objects on the server can be known.
    Author:
    Reginald Miller

        Simple method to determine if the resource already exists within the list.
